content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not agree on a final price because the potential tenant's highest offer, 550 Euro per month, was still too low for the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 7. The conversation was respectful and professional, but the negotiation did not conclude successfully.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended. The conversation was respectful and professional, and the negotiation did not conclude successfully due to a disagreement on the rental price, not any personal issues.
name: Peter Schmidt
